data.title: Golf, Party Venue, Sports Bar & Restaurant
data.meta_description: Make socializing a sport at one of our premier entertainment venues featuring fun golf games for all skill levels, full-service bar and restaurant, all-weather hitting bays and private event spaces.
data.text:
Get exclusive offers and info ! Sign up for Topgolf Auburn Hills email and text updates.

Topgolf

Phone

Address

500 Great Lakes Crossing Dr

Auburn Hills, MI

Get a Ride

Hours

Mon-Sun: 9AM - 1AM

AGE POLICY: Anyone under 16 must be supervised by a Guest 21+ at all times. Anyone under 18 must be supervised by a Guest 21+ after 9PM.

Welcome to Topgolf Detroit - Auburn Hills , the premier entertainment destination in Auburn Hills , MI . Enjoy year-round comfort in our hitting bays with cooling fans in the summer and heated bays in the winter, all with HDTVs in every bay and throughout our sports bar and restaurant. Using our complimentary clubs or your own, take aim at the giant outfield targets and our high-tech balls will score themselves.
